website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking to take your snack-packing creativity to the next level, these artist-designed snack bags are for you.
pros: Each snack bag is a work of art, with a variety of prints crafted by actual artists
Cotton shell and water-resistant polyester lining are easy to clean and 100% food safe
Dual gripper tabs offer improved handling when opening and closing
Set of 3 bags of various sizes
cons: Especially moist fruits may cause leaks

customer_reviews.title: Damaged after using once
customer_reviews.text: I just used these bags for the first time. I used the medium bag for some small snacks and when I grabbed it to get my snack I found that it had torn open.
customer_reviews.author: Ashess91

customer_reviews.title: Not really "lined," more like "coated"
customer_reviews.text: The description said these bags were "lined" with polyester: "Made from cotton fabric lined with food-safe polyester lining" There is no lining so much as some sort of coating that permeates the entire fabric and makes it very stiff. The result is a very crinkly bag. If this is cotton, it certainly doesn't feel that way. Unfortunately, the coating does not keep these bags airtight...I stored a rice cake in one and it got stale very quickly. Also, after one wash, the colors on the outside are fading in spots or coming off. I might use these for non-perishable items.
customer_reviews.author: On the Path

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Bad printing.
customer_reviews.text: The Art Lunch bags I received are beautifully designed, but poorly printed. In some areas the color has run and in others there are splotches. It's too bad because I decided to pay more for cooler looking bags but they just look cheap, unfortunately. I'd be annoyed if I were one of the artists because the manufacturing doesn't hold up to the creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal all the way...so bummed!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets, and one looks like it will seal all the way, while the other does not... both sets look great, but afraid only one set is fully functional for all our food needs. We will just use the set that does not seal all the way for something other than food!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love the designs -- nice sizes for holding a good amount of food/snacks. Easy to rinse out and they dry quickly. Description said insulated, so I was expecting a padded interior of some sort, but they are lined only with a coating. My daughter's bag had grease show through, but then again, she left the Goldfish crackers in the bag for several days... Haven't tried getting the grease out yet, but I'm expecting a little stain remover should do the trick. My bags haven't shown any food stains yet (typically I pack them with almonds, cheese sticks, apple slices, crackers...), been using them for a couple weeks and trying to be prompt about cleaning them right after use.
customer_reviews.author: fun

customer_reviews.title: Love the art, but wouldn't put food in these
customer_reviews.text: These little bags are decorated with attractive art work that my 8-yr old loved (we bought the squid/octopus). However, they have a terrible chemical smell to them, so I am not going to put food in them. The fabric has no inner lining, so don't expect any insulation if you do end up using these for food. Perhaps for nuts and for daily storage. Unfortunately son already cut the fabric labels attached to the bags before I could even see them, so am unable to return. But he really liked the art, so he will use these for crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Boncuk

customer_reviews.title: Everything goes stale very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags to match the lunch bag that I purchased, so that I could stop using ziplock bags for snacks to take to class with me. I wanted to love these bags, but within hours all of my snacks go stale or juice/water from fruits escape and leak into my lunch bag. I bought Stasher bags instead, and those keep my snacks from getting stale or leaking. I'd advise that if you're looking for something to keep snacks in all day to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: latoya

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product because it limits my use of harmful plastics. It works very good for crackers, granola, and other snack foods but keep in mind that these pouches are not air tight so if you have to store anything that will become stale within a few hours (like bread) you may want to use a plastic sandwich bag.
customer_reviews.author: sadie burton

customer_reviews.title: Kitty lunch bags not really for lunch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my lunch to save on plastic bags and help the environment, I put chips one day and the grease from the chips stained the material. And my sandwich was not fresh at lunch. I was not happy to replace my sandwich bags with this product. But I have been using for other stuff like meds, pencils, money. So i did not waste my money on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Eg

customer_reviews.title: Much more environmentally friendly than a bunch of plastic baggies, but not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very bright, colorful, lightweight, and well designed, but if you are searching for something that has a liner, keep looking. I was looking for something that would keep moisture either out or in, and that would at least have 2 layers of fabric between my lunch and the outside world. But, if you are looking for a single, easy to clean layer, these are wonderful. It looks like I'll need to make my own to get exactly what I want!
customer_reviews.author: CembalistaTop Contributor: Pianos

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing snacks, etc in your purse!
customer_reviews.text: I started on a diet program where you have control the food portions. I bought these specifically for use in my purse to carry my measuring spoons, cups (in the medium one, in case I’m eating out). I’m using the smaller one for foods/snacks to carry in my purse. I really like the fact that these are reusable. Just wash, rinse and dry or you can even wash them in your dishwasher, plus they’re very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Marzanna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I share these bags with my 2 school-aged kids. I was tired of using so many plastic bags and wanted an easier, reusable way to pack lunches. These are perfect. The only thing I worry about is getting jelly stains or food stains inside, since they don't have a liner. I don't want to have to deal with running through the dishwasher after each use because I'm afraid it will put wear and tear on the material. So, I've just been using a little saran wrap to protect the sandwich from splattering inside. And I'll do a quick wipe down of the inside for each use. These make packing lunches fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure why the description says these have an ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why the description says these have an airtight seal when the seller themselves responded to a question saying "They are not totally 100% airtight". Anyhow, to be clear, these are definitely not airtight. Having used the Lunchskins brand (which uses velcro) I appreciate the zipper closure on these because velcro wears out and can be hard to clean, even using the dishwasher. Hopefully the stiff awkward texture of the fabric (like another customer described) will soften with washing.
customer_reviews.author: scarletalphabet

customer_reviews.title: We will be ordering more of these!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely wonderful lunch containers. The sizes are perfect, one for a sandwich, one for a small snack, and one for something larger like fruit. My girls love the artwork pattern. And they can be tossed either is dishwasher or washing machine for a more thorough cleaning. We have noticed a tiny bit of fading.
customer_reviews.author: A BUSY MOM

customer_reviews.title: great value, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've really wanted to find reusable snack bags for lunch but hesitated because they're a little pricey. I ended up getting some cheaply made vinyl ones, which ended up tearing at the seams, so I broke down and got these, which are way nicer. These bags are very well made. The thickness of the material and the quality of the way it's sewn and the zipper are definitely worth the money. I haven't tried washing them in the dishwasher yet, because I've been using them every day, so I am just rinsing them out with some warm soapy water. I definitely recommend these and will buy these again for gifts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Transitioning to zero waste has its ups and downs
customer_reviews.text: Transitioning to zero waste has its ups and downs. I tried using glass containers but they were too heavy to lug around, and I can't microwave metal bento boxes. These bags have definitely made it easier. They are kinda awkward to wash by hand, but not hard at all. My only complaint is that because it's a zipper your chips, cookies, etc can go stale if you leave them in the bag too long, so I would recommend you eat your lunch ASAP. I'd definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Durable, dishwasher and kid friendly snack bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags so much I decided to write my first review ! I used them all last year for my daughter's lunches and snacks for all 3 of my kids. They are really cute and unique patterns and very durable. The large size easily holds a sandwich and they hold crackers and fruits and veggies without leaking. They are easy for kids to unzip and best of all is they are dishwasher friendly. The only reason I bought more is that my kids lost them over the school year. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed in design
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived I must admit I was disappointed in the quality of the print. I was expecting a bright, shiny, pretty print of mermaid scales and it was very dull and bland. I feel bad for the artist that their work was not depicted correctly during manufacturing. Once I got past that...looking at the bags for usage, the zipper opens and closes with ease and they appear easy to clean. As for being leak proof or able to seal air tight, I am skeptical. Hoping they are durable too but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: food leaks and grows stale
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a year. these bags are not airtight, so crunchy things grow stale and wet things leak. I never use these for items that are not dry, since they get soggy and leak everywhere. I tried bringing fruit, and it got everywhere. but the only dry things I can carry in these bags are sandwiches and trail mix; everything else grows stale within hours. it takes multiple times to become clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Murray

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I think these bags are super cute, I can't seem to really find anything wrong with them, the zippers work fine. Material is good. Though I don't plan on putting food them I'll be using them for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Cozine

customer_reviews.title: Where as the actual product has no shine which makes it look dull, and it seems the colors don't have as ...
customer_reviews.text: They are almost what was expected. The design looks very similar to the picture but it is much duller and toned down in person. The product pictures show bright shiny colorful bags that are described as having a lining. Where as the actual product has no shine which makes it look dull, and it seems the colors don't have as much variation as pictured. There is also no lining, just one piece of some unknown fabric creating the whole thing with a zipper that doesn't completely close the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great design could be better fabric for food
customer_reviews.text: could be better for holding moist dried fruit but great for totally dry items. Zipper is regular, doesn't seem to be food-grade or wet-proof one but like it much better than velcro where the food comes out from the sides if turned up side down or sideways - would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Martia R

customer_reviews.title: Loves Everything About It
customer_reviews.text: My child loves her lunch bags. She uses them every day she goes to school to pack her lunch. She says she loves how it benefits the planet as well as her own life by not creating more plastic bags as waste. She loves the design, and really just everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: LynneAH

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sandwich
customer_reviews.text: These little bags are well made and great for my lunches. Well made and easy to clean. They dried quickly in my dish drainer. Cute design and lots of compliments. Would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, great company
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags, love the designs. I’m really trying to cut down on my plastic use so I wanted something in place of ziplock baggies and these were it for me. One of the bags did come apart at the seams so I wrote the company and immediately they responded and replaced the bag. I have two sets and will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Ssov

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag for the perfect lunch
customer_reviews.text: So far so good my friend and I are college students who live off campus and to save money we pack lunches every day these things are amazing we place sandwiches wraps and fruit in them daily and they work fine we rinse them out and hang them to dry and they have been perfect I absolutely adore them
customer_reviews.author: Majestic

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: i bought these reusable bags for lunch for school.They also go along with the bag I bought...They are both sea turtle.I will be getting more of them for the school year. thanks again for the great product...
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! It is a functional & attractive way to carry snacks and not use up a thousand plastic bags! I wash mine with dish detergent and leave open on the dish rack to dry. I wish I had bought these years ago! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: Like them so far
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My kids use them mostly for sandwiches in their lunches.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of reusable bags but this one smelled ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of reusable bags but this one smelled of strong plastic I didn't feel safe enough to put food inside. The design was lovely though and I was assured a replacement can be arranged? I like this product line and ordering a lunch bag but this set will be discarded because of the strong plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Gabino

customer_reviews.title: Nice prints and very useful
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I love the bags for snacks and lunch and are so happy to cut down on plastic. Really nice prints. there was a mistake with the order that the shop fixed immediately. Really easy to communicate.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Spring Pediatrician

customer_reviews.title: These bags are really cute and a great way to eliminate single-use plastic bags when packing lunches
customer_reviews.text: These bags are really cute and a great way to eliminate single-use plastic bags when packing lunches. My only issue with these is that they aren't water/air-tight so when I pack crackers or something similar, they can get a little stale in the 5 hours between packing to lunch time. I wouldn't put things like cut fruit or berries in these bags because I feel like the bags could stain and have issues with juice getting into a lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and concept, but my snacks got stale! (So will work for some food items, but not all).
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept but I used the snack-sized bag for some protein puffs, and they got stale overnight (I pack my lunch for the next day at night). Outside of that, the quality is good and they dry quickly- I was concerned that they would not dry properly, which can result in bacteria growth. Luckily the fabric is conducive to being washed.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ehresman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality. Well made. The zipper works well and they turn inside out easily for dishwasher cleaning. They are somewhat leak proof, not for liquids for sure, and condensation will get through. I use these for raw veggies, sandwiches, nuts. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Kress

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: Love these - it matched my lunch bag, it’s easy to clean and the 3 sizes are great options for what ever I need. Smaller one is great form it’s or gold fish for my little owns; bigger one fits rice cake perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Each set have been beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd set of snack baggies I have purchased. Each set have been beautiful and functional. This time the smallest baggie had a wonky zipper that would not close easily. The company itself emailed me to see if I was happy with my purchase. I let them know about the zipper and they immediately sent out a new one. I am very happy with the customer service and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores McDonald

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I've washed them in the dishwasher several times and they are holding up great. I've mostly only used them for carrying snacks to work. They work for what I bought them for. I only wish they sold a gallon sized version.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Must have food travel bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these reusable pouches! 4 sizes gives great versatility, and they look great. My favorite one is the size (and shape) of a sandwich. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Scira

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these bags
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these bags! I am thrilled to know that my family and I will be reducing the number of plastic storage bags used. My youngest son saw them and thought they were so neat, we had to order some for him as well. We, of course, found a different pattern for him that was more fun for a 9-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Frantz

customer_reviews.title: I love that these come in three sizes and are machine ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that these come in three sizes and are machine washable. I initially bought this product because I felt bad throwing away disposable snack baggies all the time and wanted a reusable option. Buying this product allowed me to do my part of the environment, but it also had the added bonus of supporting and learning about the artist who did the design, Mark Ashkenazi. The designs are all beautiful, but I chose this particular one because the proceeds go to the World Summit organization. Will buy more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are dishwasher safe. I use the small on for snacks like grapes. I use the large one for a sandwich. I have use the middle size for banana bread. I think it is great that I can reuse them. I used to use sealable glass containers, but these are so much lighter to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: maria carter

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Pretty and the three sizes help me pack lunch every day.
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around quite a bit before buying these. The art makes them a bit more expensive, but for me,it's worth it. I love them. It's nice to not waste plastic bags every day when packing my lunch. The three different sizes make them perfect for whatever you're packing. Plus, they're pretty. Winwin. So far, very durable, and washing them in the dishwasher has not been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Shaip

customer_reviews.title: Save the environment in fashion! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical and I’m now the biggest fan! They clean so easily, air dry overnight well so they’re ready again for use in the morning. Very clean and do not leak. Gave some as presents too! Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! They are easy to clean either by hand or in the dishwasher. They hold a lot of food and are very stylish. People have asked where I got them and I am so proud to tell them! Hope more people order them to keep plastic bags out of our landfills and oceans to protect our wildlife and environment! They do save money also. Thanks for making such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, colorful, and Earth-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in LOVE with these bags! It's my first time purchasing reusable ziplocks for snacks and they're working out great for my 18mo daughter. I'm obsessed with the colors as much as I am impressed about their sturdiness. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, beautiful design!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my dauthter's lunch/snacks. They are beautiful, and easy to clean. They seem pretty durable so far, she has been bringing them to camp every day and they are holding up perfectly. ONE complaint is the amount of plastic packaging that they came in.
customer_reviews.author: jkr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable and absolutely perfect. Or should I say PURRRRfect? Sorry. I couldn't resist. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Koppelman

customer_reviews.title: I love the design
customer_reviews.text: I love the design. These are my first foray into reusable bags and I know they're a little pricey but I super adorable. I usually pack what I'm going to eat the night before or the day of so I don't have a problem with freshness. I will say that anything "greasy or oily" will stain them. Not a deal breaker for me but definitely something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Valle

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags & helping them environment
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags for my kids lunch! They are so easy to clean. I just turn them inside out and place them on the top rack. They are durable. They keep the sandwiches fresh. And have no odor from daily use & washing. I would highly recommend these! It’s helping save our earth from the plastic bags. Which is why I started using these. Now I wouldn’t go back to plastic. These bags are great!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Artist ceased snack bags.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these artist created bags. They are well made and pretty! I wish I had other choices of size combinations....more small ones, no big one would have been my preference but I'm still glad I bought them! After having owned them for a few weeks, I notice that the dye has started to migrate..... Still pretty but.....
customer_reviews.author: L. Maya-charles

customer_reviews.title: Great plastic alternative!
customer_reviews.text: The design is cute and they are very easy to clean! They fit a regular sized sandwich perfectly! Never going back to plastic bags again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mica

customer_reviews.title: attractiveand functional baggies
customer_reviews.text: Though I wish these were truly airtight, they work well enough to keep a piece of bread pretty fresh between morning and lunchtime, perhaps even a little longer. They wash well in the dishwasher (spread over the tines that separate rows on the upper rack).
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sturzenacker

customer_reviews.title: Makeup bag alternative
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a present for my sister to use as makeup bags because she likes mermaids
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy containers for lunch or anything else needed to store and carry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect compliment to the mermaid drink tumbler. Is great take to work or picnic .
customer_reviews.author: Claire Crain

customer_reviews.title: First time use, the plastic zippers stick a little ...
customer_reviews.text: First time use, the plastic zippers stick a little. I'm going to be watching that they don't break. Other than that, they are as expected with such a cute design for my elephant-obsessed child.
customer_reviews.author: little_pea76

customer_reviews.title: So cute and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of Planetwise Snafeich bags and wanted a different design. These are great and I think they’ll last a really long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jane C.

customer_reviews.title: Only Good for Dry Snacks
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pattern, but found they leaked the juice from my cut up apples in my purse. It was a sticky mess. I gave them away. They will be fine for pretzels or another kind of dry snack, but I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Good for lunch, not storage
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, durable, dishwasher safe bags. I had hoped they would keep food fresh, like a ziplock-they unfortunately do not. They are fine if you’re packing your lunch and intend to eat it that day, but not very good for food storage. They will also leak, so don’t put anything in them that will drip.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: These are truly beautiful! I ordered them as a gift and I'll ...
customer_reviews.text: These are truly beautiful! I ordered them as a gift and I'll be ordering more for myself - they are just so unique!
customer_reviews.author: AndreaV

customer_reviews.title: A cute way to save the planet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I didn't realize how many plastic bags I was using for food prep until I got these. They aren't leak proof but for bagging veggies, sandwiches, snacks etc that's not what I need anyway. They are super easy to clean, just put them in the dishwasher. Plus they're cute!
customer_reviews.author: rosiethervtr

customer_reviews.title: ... I bought from them however this set I don’t love as much
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I bought from them however this set I don’t love as much. The print bled and it seems like things get stale durning the 1st use. In theory I want to love them
customer_reviews.author: Corey Calter

customer_reviews.title: Charming & useful!
customer_reviews.text: A charming alternative to plastic bags for snacks and keeping small things contained. My toddler & I both enjoy using them-me for foodstuffs and him for carrying around his favorite toy cars. This is our second set.
customer_reviews.author: Kate W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Our whole family uses them. We have 4 sets and use them regularly. A zipper broker in one and the customer service was great! They replaced it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Morton-Maxson

customer_reviews.title: Fun, pretty, functional food bags
customer_reviews.text: So far so good for these colorful designer sandwich and snack bags. I use them for "drier" snacks and foods and have not put any carrots or fruit slices in them yet. When you clean them with water, it does leak thru seams so I would not put anything too juicy and wet in them. I might end up using the larger bag for makeup/small toiletries for an upcoming ski trip. Overall, a very fun, pretty and functional set of 3 bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not airtight
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace disposable plastic bags for packed lunches. They are cute and generally fine for a day's packed lunch, but they are not airtight like plastic bags. Bread gets kinda stale left in them too long so not ideal for longer term storage.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Smell is strong but washed out over time. Colors bled on first wash which was kind of a bummer but oh well. Overall a pretty good product. Picture from 2nd week of use. Pretty disappointed how quickly it bled, even though I never put wet/soggy items in it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors and I like the overall feel of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too sure about these yet. I may have to update this review down the road. Nice colors and I like the overall feel of these bags, but the zippers seem horrible at first glance. Thin, lightweight and they stick when zipping and unzipping. I can't imagine them lasting over prolonged use but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha B

customer_reviews.title: Brings us joy!
customer_reviews.text: Great find! We wanted to reduce our footprint and dependency on plastics. Reusable sandwich and snack bags are just the ticket. Zippers instead of Velcro and a soft outer material make this our number one choice. We will wear out the other bags we have purchased (won't take long because of the Velcro) and invest in more of these by Art of Liv'n. Maybe the mermaid or sea turtles next...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ziploc Replacement for Lunch!
customer_reviews.text: I love the different sizes and beautiful colors. The zippers are alright..hoping they will last as long as these well made snack bags!
customer_reviews.author: CMVM

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags. I've been using all the different sizes and they all come in so handy. They are easy to clean and have been holding up very well over the past few months.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: These are so beautiful. I've been using these in place of plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful. I've been using these in place of plastic baggies and I feel so much better about eliminating the plastic waste. They are easy to clean and very versatile. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and could hold up to kid use. Already purchased another set.
customer_reviews.author: Brent R Cox

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Cute, and Ecofriendly
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Cute, I don't use baggies to carry sandwiches or snacks, wash/dry well, and I get compliments all the time. Plus, they match my neoprene lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and the three sizes are the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and the three sizes are the perfect ones you'll need most times. Cute design that supports small scale artists AND it's an environmentally friendly option. Would recommend to anyone. I was hoping the insides would be lined with a type of plastic, just for cleanliness sake, but it's a pretty durable fabric so it's good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I love the artwork on these zippered, reusable baggies. They are a breeze to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ethasp

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting down environmental waste
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and so easy to clean! I love that I can put in my dishwasher and re-use over and over! Great way to cut down on environmental waste for me because I use to use one time use zip locks. .
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: I like these baggies a lot!!! I plan to purchase more for myself and to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than I thought I would. I bought a set to put apples slices and other loose snacks in my golf bag. They are perfect and tidy. They wash up nice in the top rack of the dishwasher spread out on the rack tines. I like to re-use to save the environment-no more hand washing and drying plastic baggies-i plan to purchase more of these. I plan to give them as gifts. I really like the zipper opening-it slides easy.
customer_reviews.author: di knoll

customer_reviews.title: A minimalist dream come true
customer_reviews.text: beautiful bags and great sizes. I avoid using plastic bags for packing and snacks and such. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: zoolady54

customer_reviews.title: Cutest little bags
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Exactly what I hoped for. My daughter loved them.
customer_reviews.author: klhp

customer_reviews.title: Great artwork, rather stiff
customer_reviews.text: Love the artwork. The bags are rather stuff and the zippers are not very smooth but so far holding up. They are easy to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: Starz

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These will be great for reducing the plastic in my lunch box!
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for the kids
customer_reviews.text: The snack baggies are a perfect match for my kids. The art on the bags are beautiful. We were getting tired of wasting plastic bags that were contributing to landfills being filled with plastic garbage. These have been washed in the dishwasher on the upper rack with no issues. Great material and are better than another competitor whose bag didn't live to its quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Colorful lunch
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing! I've been looking for a set of reusable bags for a good price for a while. These are great for my lunches - a large bag (lots of space for a sandwich), a medium bag - great for chips or cookies or fruit, and a small snack bag. The colorful print is just a great bonus. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: R.P.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this purchase! The bags are beautiful and sturdy quality. I'm so glad I'll be avoiding plastic by using these. I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: Great little bags
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use for sandwiches or food but they are really Nice and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and practical.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are quite good for sandwiches of varying size as well as snacks/fruit/veggies. Very easy to clean and store, they are perfect for low waste lifestyle and avoiding disposable items.
customer_reviews.author: F. F. D.

customer_reviews.title: They're a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter's school lunches and not only does she love them, but her school friends love them and want them now too! The designs are precious and the quality seems great so far. We've been using them for a week now. I'm hoping they maintain their durability because it's clear that these are a hit!
customer_reviews.author: N. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I use them in my kids lunches everyday to cut down on use of plastic baggies. They are easy to wash by hand or I can put them in the dishwasher. Great item. I plan to buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea wish I could find some with a inner lining
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is it makes bread or crackers or chips etc stal bc it’s very breathable I wish it didn’t do that bc I absolutely love these they almost need a lining to help with the material not being as breathable
customer_reviews.author: A mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lunch bag and the matching snack baggies because i'm tired of throwing away those little plastic bags every day. These are perfect. I use them for fruit or chips or whatever. I wash them out and they dry easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sympatica

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously sooo in love!!!! Love having these baggies in my matching mermaid lunch bag!! I just throw them in the dish washer when they are dirty, so easy and not wasteful!!
customer_reviews.author: Frannee Kae

customer_reviews.title: Love the art
customer_reviews.text: Love the art. The 3 different sizes are just right for various lunch items, sandwiches, chips, fruit and veggies, etc.. I also enjoyed reading the about the artist pamphlet that came with my package. The customer service was great, received a couple of emails to confirm that I was satisfied with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Araminta

customer_reviews.title: Not all designs have the same fabric quality
customer_reviews.text: Different patterns are made of different material and do not wash as well in the dishwasher. The squid with a black background is made of a flimsier material that doesn’t stand straight in the dishwasher, it doesn’t dry overnight and the inside does not clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hey

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to plastic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lunch baggies and they wash up nicely in the dishwasher. I appreciate not having to use plastic baggies every day. The middle sized bag is perfect "sandwich" size and the tiny one is like a "snack baggie". I don't use the large one as much but the other two are perfect for my kids' lunches.
customer_reviews.author: Prairiemom

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I wish I would have bought sooner. My girls 8 and 10 love for their lunch
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Fun, beautiful and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: These reuseable snack and sandwich bags are great. The artwork is beautiful, and they are well made. My daughter gets compliments on her "turtles" often. The zippers zip easily.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: These are great and I love the art work
customer_reviews.text: These are great and I love the art work. They are not good for long term storage or for keeping things like bread in for more than a day. They are great for daily snack bags though.
customer_reviews.author: Michi K

customer_reviews.title: These bags are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several types of reusable "ziploc " bags over the years. Often, the zippers are flimsy or the bag is hard to clean. These bags have solved all of the problems and are well worth the cost. The fact that they come in fun designs is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time taking my lunches, they are perfect sizing and easy to wash out or even through in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Stylish while being green
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. Makes me feel stylish while trying to be green.
customer_reviews.author: JJuby

product_meta.title: Art of Lunch by Artovida Designer Lunch Baggies for Men & Women, Boys & Girls, Fashionable, Reusable, Snack & Sandwich Bags w Zipper - Design by Budi Kwan (Indonesia) - Flock of Birds
feature_bullets: ECO-FRIENDLY AND REUSABLE - You won't have to worry anymore about all the plastic waste produced from normal disposable sandwich bags after switching to our reusable sandwich & snack bags. They look way cooler too.

EASY-OPEN ZIPPER - Feel good about sending your child to school with lunch bags that have an airtight seal, but are still easy to open. Our reusable snack bags are made with embroidered gripper tabs to help open them easily for little fingers or big ones.

EASY TO CLEAN - Our dishwasher-safe, quick-drying, grease-proof, and moisture-proof reusable lunch bags make cleanup a breeze. Like a pair of your favorite jeans, they will soften and fade with repeated washings.
CERTIFIED FOOD-SAFE - Made from cotton fabric lined with food-safe polyester lining that's been tested lead-free, BPA-free, PVC-free, and phthalate-free
MAKES AN AWESOME GIFT with the LIFETIME GUARANTEE - We sell products that last. Our rock-solid guarantee means we'll replace your lunch tote if there's ever a problem!
